21061b03-e8e9-4f87-823a-5d739cf27779.description: Medline Management Essentials program is designed to provide new managers with the mindset and skillsets necessary for becoming a successful people manager. This badge acknowledges the completion of MME Phase I which includes 2 components: (1) Synchronous course curriculum (2) Asynchronous online course work. Throughout the program, participants are given pre & post assignments and an accountability partner to help increase reinforcement, sharing of best practices, and on-the-job application.
21061b03-e8e9-4f87-823a-5d739cf27779.name: 2021 Medline Management Essentials (MME) Phase 1

c32ec7cc-b2ad-40e2-89ce-90baa28c0a7a.description: Participants completed a comprehensive year-long, in-person high potential leadership development program: Winning at Wintrust. Winning at Wintrust focuses on developing leadership skills that include self-awareness, accountability, providing feedback, holding difficult conversations, leading change in times of ambiguity, & developing and demonstrating managerial courage. Program participants honed their project management skills through intensive work on a business initiative capstone project.

1983e474-c334-4da4-8e11-08a0b2920c48.description: Leadership is displayed at all levels of an organization. No matter what your role, you have it in your power to arm yourself with key skills to propel your own development on a path that helps you grow into the leader you want to be. Our Power Skills program is comprised of three sessions related to core behaviors successful individuals must possess: Building Resilience, Empathy in the Workplace, and Leadership Agility
1983e474-c334-4da4-8e11-08a0b2920c48.name: Power Skills

98fc7ece-4d2c-4620-9bd4-eb5214661a7d.description: Leadership Essentials is a six-session interactive program, where participants learn how to develop their leadership mindset, and build trusting relationships with the individuals on their team. Participants in this program learn how to develop their team’s talent – through delegation, coaching, and feedback. They also learn to lead with a vision that inspires high performance and team connection. The capstone event is an exercise to develop their individual Leadership Philosophy.
98fc7ece-4d2c-4620-9bd4-eb5214661a7d.name: Leadership Essentials April 2022

9844280d-0a5c-411d-b422-7e72fd4e092d.description: In this Graduate Certificate program, comprising three core courses from the MBA Program, leaders dive deep into their own leadership style using the Hogan Leadership Assessment, and create their own leadership philosophy. Students then take a fresh look at business strategy and learn how to navigate complex, shifting landscapes. Leading Organizational Change provides a firm foundation from which leaders can learn to lead small, medium and large-scale change initiatives in a dynamic environment.
9844280d-0a5c-411d-b422-7e72fd4e092d.name: Leadership Foundations

1d298731-d15d-49e8-b2ab-316f6655e794.description: Due to rapid and constant changes in the world, organizations and individuals must find ways to continually adapt to remain viable. Students are expected to spend 45 hours of learning across the 5 modules both in & out of the classroom.

bedce454-5e56-4526-850d-9115b4b967c5.description: Participants explore the mindset shift that happens when you’re tapped to lead a larger team with direct reports who are leaders. Participants learn how to protect their focus on true business drivers and liberate their teams to be autonomous and accountable and challenge their direct reports to grow. Participants complete a capstone where they confirm their action plans and commit to the behaviors needed to expand their reach across their organizations and create a lasting impact for the teams.

d0f31d61-a1dc-4c6e-af11-f88edd40c581.description: Participants in the 8-month Building the Future program are focused on strategic thinking. They learn about global mindset; product mindset; analytical thinking; strategic analysis; leading through change; and activating and executing strategy. Participants can be expected to leverage systems thinking for positive impact; use data to make effective decisions; proactively adapt to the changing business environment; and exhibit critical leadership skills to effectively face business challenges.

f3355cbc-0dad-4f57-9981-d7e54cc8c8a6.description: Leadership Essentials is a six-session interactive program, where participants learn how to develop their leadership mindset, and build trusting relationships with the individuals on their team. Participants in this program learn how to develop their team’s talent – through delegation, coaching, and feedback. They also learn to lead with a vision that inspires high performance and team connection. The capstone event is an exercise to develop their individual Leadership Philosophy.
f3355cbc-0dad-4f57-9981-d7e54cc8c8a6.name: Leadership Essentials October 2022

0a2fa851-7292-4885-ac0e-858f76c060aa.description: 3 - month virtual program to create capacity for LFGSM ambassadors, engaged alumni and colleagues to grow as leaders by developing and applying mentorship skills in order to advance individual and team member growth.

89bee82c-4461-445b-b839-1859c267b37f.description: Participants in the three-module interactive virtual program, Results Through Influence, are focused on developing their ability to develop productive individual influencing relationships, curate a diverse network, and influence individuals across business units and geographies. e9cc9b49-363a-47c3-aaaf-75de1c86ed6d.description: Courses in the Leadership in Data Analytics Accredited Graduate Certificate teach students about current technological trends such as data modeling and artificial intelligence, the role they play in business strategy, and how to leverage them to fuel organizational growth.

baf0b95f-75d4-4543-bf6e-de00a2404fe1.description: Participants explore the mindset shift that happens when you’re tapped to lead a larger team with direct reports who are leaders. Participants learn how to protect their focus on true business drivers and liberate their teams to be autonomous and accountable and challenge their direct reports to grow. Participants complete a capstone where they confirm their action plans and commit to the behaviors needed to expand their reach across their organizations and create a lasting impact for the teams.
baf0b95f-75d4-4543-bf6e-de00a2404fe1.name: Leading Leaders September 2021

2375d2fb-e076-40ec-8758-871b0245d182.description: In this Accredited Graduate Certificate, students delve into the four, interrelated pillars of a truly global supply chain: Product Development & Management; Strategic Sourcing; Demand Planning & Inventory Management; and Distribution & Logistics. With the emergence of Industry 4.0, these pillars have been augmented and shaped by Big Data, AI and the continual response to the voice of the customer.
2375d2fb-e076-40ec-8758-871b0245d182.name: Four Pillars of Global Supply Chain

dd2c6caf-1027-4ff3-b96c-3c26ac965ef4.description: Participants explore the mindset shift that happens when you are tapped to lead a larger team with direct reports who are leaders. 971237bf-1df0-48b7-adc3-2311ef4f624f.description: Leadership is displayed at all levels of an organization. No matter what your role, you have it in your power to arm yourself with key skills to propel your own development on a path that helps you grow into the leader you want to be. Our Leading with Integrity program is comprised of three sessions related to core behaviors successful individuals must possess: Building Resilience, Empathy in the Workplace, and Leadership Agility
971237bf-1df0-48b7-adc3-2311ef4f624f.name: Leading with Integrity - April 2021

c16aef4f-fb3e-4e78-837c-36caabf46633.description: Medline Management Essentials program is designed to provide new managers with the mindset and skillsets necessary for becoming a successful people manager. This badge acknowledges the completion of MME Phase I which includes 2 components: (1) Synchronous course curriculum (2) Asynchronous online course work. Throughout the program, participants are given pre & post assignments and an accountability partner to help increase reinforcement, sharing of best practices, and on-the-job application.
c16aef4f-fb3e-4e78-837c-36caabf46633.name: Test badge - 2021 Medline Management Essentials (MME) Phase 1
